Commands.Name: Format Accounting 0 Decimals
Commands.Description: Format selection as Accounting with no decimals.

Commands.Name: Format Accounting 1 Decimal
Commands.Description: Format selection as Accounting with one decimal.

Commands.Name: Format Accounting 2 Decimals
Commands.Description: Format selection as Accounting with two decimals.

Commands.Name: Format Fill Light Blue
Commands.Description: Format selection with light blue fill.

Commands.Name: Format Fill Light Green
Commands.Description: Format selection with light green fill.

Commands.Name: Format Fill Light Orange
Commands.Description: Format selection with light orange fill.

Commands.Name: Format Fill Light Purple
Commands.Description: Format selection with light purple fill.

Commands.Name: Format Fill Light Red
Commands.Description: Format selection with light red fill.

Commands.Name: Format Fill Light Yellow
Commands.Description: Format selection with light yellow fill.

Commands.Name: Format Font Black
Commands.Description: Format selection with black font.

Commands.Name: Format Font Blue
Commands.Description: Format selection with blue font.

Commands.Name: Format Font Grey
Commands.Description: Format selection with grey font.

Commands.Name: Format Font Light Grey
Commands.Description: Format selection with light grey font.

Commands.Name: Format Font Red
Commands.Description: Format selection with red font.

Commands.Name: Format Font White
Commands.Description: Format selection with white font.

Commands.Name: Format Multiple 1 Decimal
Commands.Description: Format selection as multiple with one decimal (0.0x).

Commands.Name: Format Multiple 2 Decimals
Commands.Description: Format selection as multiple with two decimals (0.00x).

Commands.Name: Format Number 0 Decimals
Commands.Description: Format selection as Number with no decimals.

Commands.Name: Format Number 1 Decimal
Commands.Description: Format selection as Number with one decimal.

Commands.Name: Format Number 2 Decimals
Commands.Description: Format selection as Number with two decimals.

Commands.Name: Format Number 3 Decimals
Commands.Description: Format selection as Number with three decimals.

Commands.Name: Format Percent 0 Decimals
Commands.Description: Format selection as Percent with no decimals.

Commands.Name: Format Percent 1 Decimal
Commands.Description: Format selection as Percent with one decimal.

Commands.Name: Format Percent 2 Decimals
Commands.Description: Format selection as Percent with two decimals.

Commands.Name: Format Short Date
Commands.Description: Format selection as short date (m/d/yyyy).

Commands.Name: Remove Fill Colors
Commands.Description: Removes all fill colors from selection.
